values:
well today i found out that my best fucking friend is probably moving out of her house and in with her boyfriends mom this summer. how great is that. not really it sucks major ass b/c her boyfriends mom lives in PA. i feel like my whole world is crumbling apart rite under my feet! i dont know how to deal with all these things at once. i put on a smile at school but then when i get home im so upset but nobody knows it but me. i miss how everything used to be, i used to be so happy and fun to be around, now im not happy and im not fun to be around and i know it. idk maybe im just being stupid like always but then again maybe im not.
i just dont know what to do..i want everything to be the way it used to be. there is just to much stuff going on with me rite now and its bringing me down.

Would you ever...

What are my strengths?

Why aren't we closer?

i keep thinking to myself that i am over you.
i tell myself that i wont cry over you anymore.
but everything reminds me of you
and babe its hard,
its hard to forget about you
its hard to make this hurting stop
you broke my heart once
you broke my heart twice
but i will not let you break my heart again!

y the hell can i not get over you?..and when i think that i am starting to..i see you in the hallway your smile..it reminds you of the smile you used to have when we were together...i loved that smile and now there wont be that smile anymore..i really need to get over you and soon..cuz this heart ache is unbearable and i think im about to loose control of my actions..very soon.
my friends always tell me that a guy is not worth your tears and the one that is wont make you cry..well boy..i dont know know what to say becuase i actually loved you and now we are over so some how i have to get over i told you that i didnt want to get to close to you when we first started this boyfriend girlfriend thing..and now look at me i got to attached and look where that got me..i was in love and now i still am..but the guy im in love with doesnt love me back..you told me you were over me and maybe im just being dramatic but i dont know i just cant seem to get over you..you were so perfect for me..we used to talk about how we would always be together..and now we are not and we wont every be again..everyone says that we were perfect and that we will get back together..i guess they dont know how you feel..and i guess i dont either..i want to get over you..i really do but you were the first guy i loved and i dont think that feeling will ever go away..maybe some day but not anytime soon..

can somebody please cheer me up..and if you have ever felt like this can you tell me how you dealt with it?..cuz this is really hard..

well this was a fun filled weekend..
friday- went to take the puppies for their shots, they didnt like that..after that we got wing man (dont like that place that much) i just got chicken wings..when we were leaving there were these black guys that were selling strawberries car to car and as we were pulling out of the parking lot this guy was bent down and we didnt see only his crack we saw his whole ass! it was horrible me dad looked and was like OMG and turned my mom looked and was oh shit and then i was like what and i looked and i was like dear god..that was horrible..we went home and me and my mom watched the last episode of Third Watch..that was the best show and now they are taking it off air..
Saturday- didnt think i was going to do anything but my cousin called me up and she was like do u wanna go to a party and i was like not really and she said please i asked her if it was Dr. Daves party and she was like yea (dr. dave is my siters boss) so i was like when is it going to end and she said around midnight and i was like fine so she was like thank you we will be there in 15 minutes so i rushed and got ready..we got there and it was soo boring we asked my sister what time we were leaving and she was like at 1 or 2 in the morning and when we asked that it was about 5:30ish so we were like oh god..we sat in the car for a little bit and blasted rap music it was kinda fun..then we talked to LG on my cell she was on speaker fone by the time we got outta the car it was about 6ish so we went and my cousin went to ride the horse that Dr Dave had at his house..that was kinda boring we didnt know anyone so michelle asked her dad to take us home and he said no..everyone was getting drunk and my sister and rick started drinking a little bit..we called up my mom and asked if she could come get us and around 10 she finally said that she needs directions to get there..so when she got the directions we sat in the car for about 5 minutes then said bye to everyone and walked up the road to meet my dad when he came..michelle sat in someones grass that was next to the road and i was dancing and doing cart-wheels in the road i went to do one and i kinda fell and hurt my hand but it was all good we started laughing..then someone came and it kinda looked like my dads car but it wasnt it was the guy who lived in the house we were in front of..it was weird he was like hello and i said hi and he asked what we were doing and i said waiting for my dad to come get us so he asked my name and i was like..ashley and he said thanks..then he went inside and michelle was like watch he is gonna go get his dog..he did..that thing ran out the house and down the driveway barking and growling michelle like got behind me and i was like there is an electric fence and michelle was like so that dont mean shit and i was like yea your right we were like in the middle of the road..so i was like ok lets walk down here so we did then my dad came and we got home went outside for a little bit then came in got blankets and pillows and went out on the trampoline and looked at the stars..and we fell asleep..that was fun sunday- mothers day michelle spent the night saturday and then we went to wal mart to get my mom something for mothers day and we went to the shoes after i found a card cuz i wanted to see the sandals then there was just one mexican..i started reading the card to michelle and i turned around and there were two mexicans then three i was like what the hell lets get outta here so we started walking and they flipping followed us around wal mart so we lost them in the garden place then we walked back up to where the school stuff is and then we ran in to them so i was like wtf and we cut off into the womans clothing place and they stopped and looked at us so we hid behind a rack of clothes kinda weird then we saw my dad and we bolted to get to him..we got home and then everyone came over the whole family and some friends..today was pretty cool..well i gotta go everyone wants me to go and play volleyball.. peace out bitches _COMMENTpeople_ <33 Ad

well i guess you can say that today was a pretty good day!
2nd mod sucked ass though..my spanish teacher is retarded! i dont like her
each "family" had a section of a dialog that we had to explain, draw a picture and
do charades to explain what was going on in the dialog..my family didnt know what we were doing..
so we took up like 15-20 minutes of the class just standing there getting yelled at cuz we werent doing it rite so my teacher would draw a picture to show how stupid we were and then we would sit down and she would say we were not done..so we had to get back up and do it all over again..it was insane i hate spanish 2 with a passion!!
so anyways my art teacher who is a big dick head he is in texas for some meeting about comic books or something he wont be back until thursday!..everyong is excited bout that...
well im out

havent updated in like forever so i fet like updating
well last weekend was awesome...

Friday- Lauren Goldstein came over and we went to a keys game b/c my neice and nephews were selling tickets for there school so my mom bought 4 one for me her dad and josh..but since we werent together mom asked me if we could take LG  so yea..when we got there it was raining and cold and nasty..so me and LG went and took a walk around the place where all the food stands were..then we got a thing of popcorn with my neice Skylar and we all shared that..but it was kinda nasty..it tasted old. So then we were all stuffed and my mom said that we should get our food now and so we did LG got chicken fingers and fries and i got a cheese burger and fries..but my mom being a retard told me to throw away the trash so i did..i got back to my seat and she asked if i got my burger and i said no so then she said that i threw it away so all i had was fries and half of a chicken finger that LG couldnt finsh..that was great..about 5 minutes later there was a rain delay..so me and LG took a "walk" out to the car but we didnt go to the car we went to a bus stop thing and chilled..hehe..and my mom calls like 20 minutes later and said that we were leaving..so we go and get home then every one that we were with at the game was at my house with my puppies..and so me and LG didnt want to go inside rite then so we went to the corn field and the grass stuff was wet so our pants were wet all the up to our knees just about..well like half way up our shins..and our shoes and everything was went..LG was flipping out b/c she saw the farmers head lights and she thought that he was coming in the corn field so she bolted..it was funny i was laughing my ass off and so was she..it was great..

Saturday- we got up and went to McDonalds for breakfast.. then came home and watched freaky friday...i fell asleep..then we got up and went to the corn field to "chill" and then we heard a 4 wheeler coming towards us..so we started to walk away and this really hott guy came up on his 4 wheeler he said he was my new neighbor moving into the house that was being bulit on the farm..his name was Greg..and damn was he hott..so me LG and Greg talked for about 5 minutes and then he left and we left..we went home and just hung out until her dad came to pick her up..after she left i worked on my homework..and that whole day my mom was not talking to me..and if i asked her something or talked to her she would ignore me or yell at me so i was like um ok what ever..and then got online..

Sunday- went to my cousins house..but b4 that i got in the shower and i had to wait for my hair to dry so that i could straighten it..and we had to leave b4 i could..so i told my mom i wasnt ready and she was like to bad get ur ass out of bed stop watching tv throw ur hair up in a bun or whatever and lets go so i was like fuck this shit i got up turned the tv off..went in my room slammed my door..put my hair up put jeans on got my books together so i could do homework got my purse and i was ready in 5 minutes..but then it took every one else a half hour to get ready just about..so i went and took the puppies outside to go to the bathroom and i was soo pissed..and the puppies have this thing they do if they dont want to come inside..when u walk up to them and ur like at arms length where u can get them they look at each other and dart in opposite directions...no lie..i wasnt in the mood then and it took me 10 minutes to get them so i had to go inside get my dog bring her out throw the ball for her and the puppies chase her so when she came back up with the ball the puppies were rite there and i got them i was so pissed so i went out to the car after putting then in the house and sat there till every one was ready..when i got to my cousins we ate dinner and then me and michelle went for a "walk " for about and hour..when we got back to the house my puppies were there..we went down to her dads studio where he records his music and we chilled and listened to music talked to ppl and watched tv with Skylar..michelle straightened my hair while i did my homework..then went home with my mom still not talking to me and redid my hair and went to bed

Monday- not alot happened my mom was still not talking to me she just ignores me and i hate it b/c me and my mom are so close..and i hate not talking to her and i hate being ignored so what ever she will talk to me when ever she is not pissed at me..i dont even know what i did..

Today- i had my mock interview..it went better than i exspected it would go..my interviewer was late..my interview was at 11:25 durning my lunch..i was there at 11:20 and she wasnt there so i just sat there and waited she got there around 11:35ish..it was insane but what ever i was only in there for 10 minutes..and i got to miss a part of art which is always good..b/c my teacher is a dick..he gave erica lunch detention when she was sitting in my chair helping me on something..that pissed me off..so i tried to get lunch detention too but i didnt get it..me jon nordling and mike horner always get yelled at..just about every day..i think its funny..but today wasnt the great anyways..it was a long day and art wasnt that great..but yea i have homework so im gonna go..

i think this is the longest entry i have ever written..lol

FaNtAbUlOuSLoU: what is ment to be will always find a way, so if you and Josh are ment to be, you will be, just give it time, but if your not, then someone else is ment for you.

((omg...read this. it is so incredibly sad... ))

Derick and Lily are sitting alone in the park one night.

Derick:
I guess we are the left overs in this world

Lily:
I think so .. all of my friends have boyfriends
and we are the only the 2 people left in this world
without any special person in our lives

Derick:
Yup, I don't know what to do

Lily:
I know! We'll play a game

Derick:
What game?

Lily:
I'll be your girlfriend for 30 days
and you will be my boyfriend

Derick:
That's a great plan,
in fact i don't have anything to do
much for the following few weeks

DAY 1:
They watch their first movie
and they both are touched by the romantic film

DAY 4:
They went go to the beach and have a picnic
Derick and Lily have their quality time together

DAY 12:
Derick invited Lily to a circus
and they ride through a Horror House
Lily was scared and she thought she touched Derick's hand
but she actually touched someone else's hand
they both laughed

DAY 15:
They saw a fortune teller down the road,
and they asked for their future advice.
The fortune teller said:
"My darlings, please don't waste the time of your life.
spend the rest of your time together, happily."
Then tears flow out from the teller's eyes

DAY 20:
Lily invited Derick to go to the hill
and they saw a meteor
Lily mumbled something

DAY 28:
They sat on the bus, and because of a bumpy road
Lily gave her first kiss to Derick by accident

DAY 29:
11:37 pm:
Lily and Derick sat in the park where they
first decided to play this game

Derick:
I'm tired Lily...Do you want anything to drink?
I'll buy you one.. I'll just go down the road

Lily:
An Apple Juice, that's all thank you

Derick:
Wait for me

20 mins later
A stranger approached Lily

Stranger:
Are you a friend of Derick?

Lily:
Yes, why? What happened?

Stranger:
A reckless drunk driver ran over Derick,
he is in critical condition in the hospital

11:57 pm
The doctor walked out of the emergency room
he handed Lily an apple juice and a letter

Doctor:
We found this in Derick's pocket

Lily reads the letter and it says:
Lily, These past few weeks,
I realized you are a really cute girl,
and I am really falling for you
Your cherished smile, your everything,
when we played this game
Before this game would end
I would like you to be my girlfriend for the rest of my life
I love you Lily

Lily crumpled up the paper and shouted:
"Derick! I don't want you to die
I love you .. Remember that night when we saw a meteor
I mumbled something
I mumbled that I wish we would be together forever
and that we would never have to end this game.
Please don't leave me Derick .. I love you!
You can't do this to me!"

Then the clock strikes 12 ..

Derick's heart stoped pumping..

It was the 30th day
